external_games.name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - Scenario "Prisoners of the Battles"

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - Scenario "Prisoners of the Battles"
summary: Wizardry: Prisoners of the Battles is a DLC scenario for The Five Ordeals in which the adventurers face relentless challenges in their attempt to aid the local royal guard.
